user.title: üè† Arrowhead ECi Alarm Panel Setup
user.description:
Connect to your Arrowhead ECi Series alarm panel.

üîπ **ECi Series Features:**
‚Ä¢ Automatic zone detection
‚Ä¢ Manual area configuration (user specified)
‚Ä¢ Up to 32 outputs for automation
‚Ä¢ MODE 4 enhanced features (firmware 10.3.50+)

üí° **Setup Approach:** Zones are detected automatically, but you specify which areas you use for maximum reliability.

data_description.host: The IP address where your ECi panel can be reached
data_description.user_pin: User number and PIN code separated by space (e.g., '1 123')

zone_config.title: üè° Configure Zones and Areas

data_description.auto_detect_zones: Automatically detect zones from your ECi panel's configuration using status parsing
data_description.max_zones: Override detected zone limit if needed (8-248 for ECi panels)
data_description.areas: Specify which areas are active (e.g., '1' for single area, '1,2,3' for multiple) - REQUIRED
data_description.configure_zone_names: Set custom names for detected zones instead of 'Zone 001', etc.

zone_names.title: üè∑Ô∏è Name Your Zones

data.skip_zone_naming: ‚è≠Ô∏è Skip naming (use default Zone 001, Zone 002, etc.)

output_config.title: ‚ö° Configure Outputs
output_config.description:
Set how many outputs to manage with Home Assistant.

üìä **ECi Panel Specifications:**
‚Ä¢ Standard outputs: 4 (main panel)
‚Ä¢ Maximum supported: 32 (with expanders)
‚Ä¢ Compatible with: Lights, sirens, door locks, garage doors, and other relay-controlled devices

{mode_4_features}

üí° **Note:** You can control any device connected to your ECi panel's output terminals through Home Assistant.

data_description.max_outputs: How many outputs to create switches for (1-32 for ECi panels)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the ECi panel. Check IP address and network connectivity.
error.connection_refused: Connection refused by the ECi panel. Check if the panel is online and port is correct.
error.timeout: Connection timeout. The ECi panel may be unreachable or busy.
error.auth_failed: Authentication failed. Check username, password, and user PIN.
error.invalid_response: Invalid response from ECi panel. The panel may be incompatible or experiencing issues.
error.client_error: Communication error with the ECi panel.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred during setup.

abort.already_configured: This ECi panel is already configured.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one Arrowhead ECi panel can be configured per Home Assistant instance.

init.title: Arrowhead ECi Panel Options

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the ECi panel for status updates (10-300 seconds)
data_description.timeout: Maximum time to wait for panel responses (5-60 seconds)
data_description.enable_debug_logging: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting issues
data_description.auto_detect_zones: Automatically detect zones from ECi panel configuration using status parsing
data_description.max_zones: Maximum zone number to monitor (8-248 for ECi panels)
data_description.areas: Active areas as comma-separated numbers (1-32 for ECi panels) - REQUIRED MANUAL INPUT
data_description.max_outputs: How many outputs to create switches for (1-32 for ECi panels)
data_description.configure_zone_names: Set custom names for your zones

zone_names.title: Zone Names Configuration

Set custom names for your zones (showing {zone_count} zones)

üí° **Best Practices:**
‚Ä¢ Use location-based names (e.g., 'Front Door', 'Kitchen Window')
‚Ä¢ Include sensor type if helpful (e.g., 'Garage Motion', 'Basement Glass Break')
‚Ä¢ Keep names concise but descriptive
‚Ä¢ Use consistent naming conventions
